member.name: XINPUT_STATE
member.summary: Represents the state of a controller.

member.name: XINPUT_STATE.dwPacketNumber
member.summary: State packet number. The packet number indicates whether there have been any changes in the state of the controller. If the dwPacketNumber member is the same in sequentially returned XINPUT_STATE structures, the controller state has not changed.

member.name: XINPUT_STATE.Gamepad
member.summary: structure containing the current state of a controller.
